Description:
Actively seek new customers and maintain relationships with existing customers to generate sales leads and secure orders.
Deliver persuasive product/service presentations, showcasing features and benefits to potential customers.
Effectively present and demonstrate products/services, emphasizing their unique features and benefits to prospective customers.
Seek new customers, foster relationships, and secure orders to drive sales leads and revenue as a Van Sales Representative.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience in van sales or a related field, preferably in the retail sector.
Demonstrated experience in van sales or a related field, preferably in retail.
Good understanding of products/services, including features, specifications, and practical applications.
Proficient organizational and time management skills for efficient task prioritization and meeting deadlines.
